oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Joseph Baldwin Taft
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white profile photograph of Joseph Baldwin Taft, Lt. Col., 143 New York. Born August 9, 1838. Died on November 25, 1863 at the Battle of Missionary Ridge, Battle of Chattanooga. Buried at Chattanooga's National Cemetery. Photogropher was R. W. Addis, 308 Penna Avenue, Washington, D. C.
